Title: Keeper in the role of pusher-support

AbilityTooltips.keeper_of_the_light_illuminate: This ability helps you to damage your enemies. + This ability will help you kill the enemy if he flees with a small amount of hp. with this ability you can fluff up the line very quickly, has included the ability of four seconds and Creeps.
AbilityTooltips.keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak: If the opposing team has the Mages have a very powerful ability to download this ability when you pursue the enemy hero, hang onto it this ability, and he's dead.
AbilityTooltips.keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic: If your team has heroes who need mana, this ability will be useful
AbilityTooltips.keeper_of_the_light_recall: Save the hero at any time
AbilityTooltips.keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light: Toss enemies or throw them in the epicenter of the battle
AbilityTooltips.keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form: It is this ability will be useful if your allies will need help to teleport or simply run away from the battlefield
